text: The Muppet Show is a variety television series. It aired from 1976 until 1981. The series starred Jim Henson's Muppet characters. Each episode featured a famous guest star. A revival of the show, Muppets Tonight, aired from 1996 to 2001. The main characters on the series are Kermit the Frog, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and Gonzo the Great. ==Performers== * Jim Henson - Kermit the Frog, Rowlf the Dog, Waldorf, The Swedish Chef, Dr. Teeth, Beautiful Day Monster, Shakey Sanchez, Gloat, The Newsman, Green Heap, Flower Eating Monster, Timmy Monster, Lubbock Lou, additional Muppets * Frank Oz - Fozzie Bear, Miss Piggy, Sam the Eagle, Animal, Mildred Huxhetter, George the Janitor, Purple Heap, Beaker, Gramps, Additional Muppets * Dave Goelz - Additional Muppets * Louise Gold - Annie Sue, Janice, Lou, Additional Muppets * Jerry Nelson - Robin the Frog, Floyd Pepper, Snake Frackle, Lew Zealand, Gorgon Heap, Doglion, Pierre LaCousse, Pops, Thog, Slim Wilson, Additional Muppets * Richard Hunt - Scooter, Statler, Sweetums, Boppity, Bubba, Additional Muppets * Steve Whitmire - Rizzo the Rat, Lips, Zeke, Additional Muppets == Other websites == * Category:1970s American comedy television series Category:1976 American television series debuts Category:Muppets Category:First run syndicated television programs Category:1981 American television series endings Category:English-language television programs
title: The Muppet Show
